name: Alien Escape - RPG
description: This RPG game is an extension of the original Alien Escape Platformer Arcade game! We're back helping Griz, our favorite green, two-legged Alien escape from the laboratory. Griz has been abducted from his home planet of Miz by a group of evil scientists who wish to experiment on him. In this version, you must help Griz find his way through the complex underground tunnel system of the lab and get all of the green juice in order for him to escape. Use the arrow keys to navigate through the tight tunnels. In search of the store rooms that are hiding his green juice. These rooms are protected by heavy metal doors, and you must use the mouse to aim and shoot Griz's radioactive goo to get through them.
